title: Microsoft Outperforms Alphabet in Latest AI Showdown
description: Microsoft’s recent financial report has demonstrated its dominant position in the AI market, overshadowing its competitor, Alphabet. title: VanEck submits new application for spot Bitcoin ETF amid regulatory uncertainty
description: VanEck, a key player in the investment sector, has submitted another application for a spot Bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC).
